sources.title: Street Corner (1948) MELODRAMA
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Marcia Mae Jones (1924-2007) made her acting debut when director James Cruze saw her in her baby carriage at six months old and cast her as the baby in his film MANNEQUIN (1926).

Exclusive PizzaFLIX edition restored and edited for YouTube
Stars: Marcia Mae Jones, John Treul, Joseph Crehan 
Director: Albert H. Kelley

In this exploitation told tale, tragedy follows after a high school girl and her boyfriend decide to secretly marry when they learn she is with child.

metadata.Plot: Naive small-town girl gets pregnant on her prom night, and winds up in the clutches of the local abortionist.
metadata.Writer: Jack Jungmeyer, Albert H. Kelley, Edwin Roth
metadata.Actors: Joseph Crehan, Marcia Mae Jones, Jean Fenwick
